definition: to drop/to fall/to come down/to descend
surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]

sentences.english: Let the sky lanterns shine, to illuminate the future, shine with great splendor, blessing the world.
sentences.chinese: 让天灯普照大地，照亮未来，光辉灿烂，降福人间。

sentences.english: I have determined to do this city harm and not good, declares the LORD .
sentences.chinese: 耶和华说，我向这城变脸，降祸不降福。
愿上帝降福于你们所有人。

sentences.english: I prayed for blessings upon the blind man and his granddaughter.
sentences.chinese: 我祈求上帝，降福给这位眼盲者和他的孙女。

sentences.english: The Lord has promised good to me.
What is the meaning of the Nuptial Blessing at Mass?
sentences.chinese: 弥撒中降福婚配，是什么意思？

sentences.english: You are now the blessed of the Lord.
sentences.chinese: 如今你实是上帝降福的人。

definition: abundant harvest of all food crops/bumper grain harvest
(of a supernatural or divine being) to appear/to make itself manifest
favorable weather (idiom); good weather for crops
to hope/to wish/hope/wish/(old) name of an official post
long-lived people, rich harvests (idiom); stable and affluent society/prosperity
to pray/to pray for sth/to wish sth/prayer/wish
